headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Nvidia, Tesla, Hecla, Newmont, Nike, Vanda, Corcept, DJT, and More
summary: Nvidia shares rise on reports of strong interest from Chinese customers in the chip maker’s hardware, while Newmont and Hecla Mining decline as precious metals prices tumble.

headline: Galleon Gold Completes Repurchase of Royalty on the West Cache Project
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - December 31, 2025) - Galleon Gold Corp. (TSXV: GGO) (FSE: 3H90) (the "Company" or "Galleon Gold") is pleased to announce that it has successfully completed the repurchase of a 3% net smelter return royalty (the "Royalty") on the Company's West Cache Gold Project ("West Cache" or the "Project") from a wholly-owned subsidiary of Newmont Corporation ("Newmont") (Previously announced on October 16, 2025).Pursuant to the agreement, Galleon Gold has exercised its...
